Text: does anyone have any info or background on the source of this mix? tracks 3, 4, 9 and 12 are not BoC but they are fucking awesome tracks in their own right. does anyone know the artist?? i must know!
kalkin75, those are by Boards of Canada. Those tracks are from their album "The Campfire Headphase," which has a quite different sound from the rest of their stuff.
a short survey of BOC's work, properly selected and mixed. thx
